scripts.uglify: uglifyjs assets/js/vendor/jquery/jquery-3.2.1.min.js assets/tipuesearch/tipuesearch_set.js assets/tipuesearch/tipuesearch.min.js assets/js/plugins/whenInviewport.min.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.fitvids.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.greedy-navigation.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.lazy.min.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.magnific-popup.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.smooth-scroll.min.js assets/js/_main.js -c -m -o assets/js/main.min.js
scripts.build:js: npm run uglify && npm run add-banner
scripts.start: bundle exec jekyll serve --drafts true --limit_posts 20 --verbose true --watch
